r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with memcached via libmemcached library
r.d: This extension uses libmemcached library to provide API for communicating with memcached servers.
r.n:
PHP 7.0 - 7.1 - 7.2 - 7.3 - 7.4 release of memcached extension. Note that support for libmemcached 0.x series has been discontinued and the oldest actively tested version is 1.0.8. It is highly recommended to use version 1.0.18 of libmemcached.
Fixes * Fix build with PHP 7.4 release due to ulong typedef removal (#445)
